Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: requestedSKU
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: SKU of the requested article by the host app

Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: purchasedSKU
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: SKU that is used to place the order

Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: quantity
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: The quantity of the items purchased for the given SKU

Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: customerNumber
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: The customer number, would be nil in case the user placed the order as guest

Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: billingAddress
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: Billing Address used by the user to place the order

Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.name: shippingAddress
Structs/OrderConfirmation.html#/s:vV18Za.abstract: Shipping Address used by the user to place the order

Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.name: clientId
Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Identifier of a client / business entity / app. Required for correct operation,

Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.name: salesChannel
Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Identifier of a sales channel. Required for correct operation, provided after access granted.

Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.name: interfaceLanguage
Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Sets language of the interface. Overrides sales channel default language.

Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.name: configurationURL
Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Sets config service URL. In regular cases it shouldn’t be changed.

Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.name: useRecommendations
Structs/Options.html#/s:vV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Sets if recommendations are handled by the host app.

Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.name: debug(_:verbose:function:filePath:fileLine:)
Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Logs a message constructed of items if logging level is Logger.Severity.debug only.

Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.name: message(_:verbose:function:filePath:fileLine:)
Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Logs a message constructed of items if logging level is Logger.Severity.message or Logger.Severity.error.

Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.name: error(_:verbose:function:filePath:fileLine:)
Structs/Logger.html#/s:ZFV18ZalandoComme.abstract: Logs a message constructed of items if logging level is Logger.Severity.debug,

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:vV18Z.abstract: Configuration of a client handling API calls

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Creates Cart, and makes Checkout from it. Additionally handle specific corner cases.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: createOrder(from:completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Places order based on formerly created checkout.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: guestCheckoutPaymentSelectionURL(request:completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Retrieves URL containing web page handling payment process.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: createGuestOrder(request:completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Creates order from a checkout in Guest Checkout mode.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: addresses(completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Fetches list of UserAddress containing all customer’s addresses available for both

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: createAddress(with:completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Creates new address in customer’s address book.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:ZFV18.name: configure(options:completion:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:ZFV18.abstract: Configures and returns API client based on given options.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:vV18Z.name: isAuthorized
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:vV18Z.abstract: Determines if a client has an access token to call restricted endpoints.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: authorize(with:)
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Authorizes a client with given access token required in restricted endpoints.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.name: deauthorize()
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:FV18Z.abstract: Deauthorizes a client from accessing restricted endpoints.

Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:ZFV18.name: deauthorizeAll()
Structs/ZalandoCommerceAPI.html#/s:ZFV18.abstract: Deauthorizes all clients by removing all stored tokens and notifying about it
